website_summaries.verdict: Quality tablets from a trusted brand, but some find the size and texture make them hard to swallow.
pros: Helps your body regulate fluid levels, muscle function and nerve conductivity
Many found decrease in leg cramping
cons: Some find these tablets to be large and challenging to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Muscle Cramps Are Gone.
customer_reviews.text: I can't eat that many bananas, but I can take one of these per day and the terrible charlie horses are gone. Another high quality product from Now.
customer_reviews.author: MoBee

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: They are too hard to swallow, especially if you try to swallow multiple supplements at once. I recommend capsules of potassium citrate instead. They are smaller and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mullaney

customer_reviews.title: Go get a banana!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to swallow these whole or even when I break them in half. They get stuck in my throat! Also, this is only like 5% daily potassium!! Eat a banana instead, more potassium by a mile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this for over two years and I love and purchase many of my supplements from "now" because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over two years and I love and purchase many of my supplements from "now" because of the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger and more powdery than Nature’s Wonder brand but for the price, they are just what I needed. I’ve not taken long enough to know if they’re working as they should but I do feel like I have less leg cramps.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyNumber143

customer_reviews.title: Good Suppliment for Leg Cramps at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I always worry when I change brands of suppliments, but the NOW Foods Potassium works great. I take it for leg cramps, and in the past when I had to change vendors, it took a long time to find one that worked right for me. This one is great, and at a way better price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Garton

customer_reviews.title: Best crushed with a decent mortar-and-pestle
customer_reviews.text: Pretty large to swallow. We crush 'em with a 4.7 inch Flexzion (purchased from Amazon), add water, and down the hatch.
customer_reviews.author: Zork

customer_reviews.title: Take your minerals separately from vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Helps my body deal with lack of cartilage pain! Along with a full spectrum magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Houbein

customer_reviews.title: I've been using and carrying these for several years on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using and carrying these for several years on serious hikes, scrambles, and climbs. These have saved several trips where a participant, including myself, is experiencing debilitating muscle cramps. A few of these with a large swig of water and a few minutes break, the cramps have gone away or become manageable enough for the person to summit. Yes, I have purchased these multiple times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work fine, I just don’t care for tablets
customer_reviews.text: These have helped me come to terms with knowing I hate tablets. Capsules go down much easier. These stick to my mouth and and taste bad thus defeating the point of having pill form. Switching to capsules.
customer_reviews.author: OneHotMomma

customer_reviews.title: Very low dose of potassium
customer_reviews.text: One tablet only gives 2 percent of the recommended daily of potassium. That's worthless. One bite of a banana gives you more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Dry tablets
customer_reviews.text: Tablets are not coated, are dry, and difficult to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: antera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The swallowing part is just my issue and I find it hard
customer_reviews.author: Rolf NYC

customer_reviews.title: I trust this brand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow capsules, good ingredients. I use this brand all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get enough potassium without a supplement....these are good.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Trusted source
customer_reviews.text: Your body needs it, trusted brand, I use other products as well
customer_reviews.author: jwjones

customer_reviews.title: Bioavailable Potassium
customer_reviews.text: Good product, recommend this for anyone who needs this electrolyte
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Felt no different
customer_reviews.text: I felt no different taking these, even at a higher dose.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the results that I am getting with it
customer_reviews.author: gleandria

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended this product to me and I'm happy she did
customer_reviews.text: I've Been taking this for about 2 months now. It really helps when your lifting weight! It doesn't make you as sore the next day! A friend recommended this product to me and I'm happy she did! Highly recommend! And great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: bianca manes

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This really prevents my leg cramps after a heavy workout or long run. It works great for me and I don't want to ever run out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great product for the right price. Delivered quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: Just chew it
customer_reviews.text: Helps with muscle cramps and fatigue. I used to get pretty bad cramps in my legs and neck. I haven't gotten a cramp since taking it. Helps with muscle fatigue from working. The next day you'll feel better. There's no way anyone's getting 4 grams of potassium from their diet. While you're probably eating beyond the recommendation amount of sodium which is counterbalanced by potassium. You'll probably benefit from taking it. The negative is that the pill isn't covered but it tastes fine so chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willman

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent kankles (swollen ankles in flights)!
customer_reviews.text: Tip was told was take 8-10 before a greasy/junk meal (ex/ pizza) and reduces ankle /leg swelling while taking flight trips)! I swear by it! Really works (makes you pee just a little more than regular, but worth it)!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I' have found they have excellent quality control
customer_reviews.text: I've used Now Foods products for 30 yrs. I' have found they have excellent quality control. They have excellent customer service if you need to contact them directly with a problem. This product absorbs well. Prefer the tablet form over the capsules. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J & J G

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be much slower in release than Powder or Capsules
customer_reviews.text: Works much better, with fewer side effects than using the Powder (which I was doing for months) and/or the capsules (which release quickly, like the Powder). Meaning my stomach seems to be tolerate this much better. These tablets are relatively small (holding only 545mg total or 99mg of pure Potassium), and so are fairly to swallow (and I take 4 of them at time). Definitely my favorite form, and they seem to very well absorbed and utilized. I was actually quite surprised at the difference, as I've tried the Now powder and capules forms...neither of which worked nearly as well. I
customer_reviews.author: Winenut

customer_reviews.title: Now is always a good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good stuff like all the NOW products I have used so far. Great way to boost potassium levels that doesn't upset the stomach. Found this very helpful especially summer time when you sweat a lot. Also very good for preventing cramping.
customer_reviews.author: james berry

customer_reviews.title: NOW Potassium Gluconate
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a cancer patient & one of the meds she is on depletes her Potassium. The NOW brand has done a great job keeping her levels up.
customer_reviews.author: evie51

customer_reviews.title: Just as good at half the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used to shop around for supplements, but I'm finding Amazon has the best prices - and sometimes it's the same exact product.
customer_reviews.author: jchausmann

customer_reviews.title: Helps low blood salts
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with MAG64 (Magnesium Chloride Perscription) because I run low blood salts which is not only dangerous but also results in leg cramps and “Charlie Horses”. This combination works great! Drink water too.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: works great, good value, but pills could be a tad smaller
customer_reviews.text: works great, good value, but pills could be a tad smaller
customer_reviews.author: Linda Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg cramps and muscle cramps but still remember to hydrate
customer_reviews.text: If you get muscle cramps or leg cramps this is your cure-all
customer_reviews.author: heyrob

customer_reviews.title: Nice size potassium caplets
customer_reviews.text: These are great caplets in great packaging. Small and easy to swallow with no aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: J Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Did its job.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the cramps in my legs . this worked
customer_reviews.author: A Sheets

customer_reviews.text: This vitamin has only 2% of the recommended daily amount per pill. Look carefully before buying unless you want to be taking many large 'horse' pills per day.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: works well for us
customer_reviews.text: she takes 2 per week, i take 6 per week. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Its a Good Product! to help with leg cramps
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to fing in in doses more than 99mg! Its a Good Product! to help with leg cramps!
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I get cramps without extra potass. Have taken for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzypoo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality...digests well.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using "Now" vitamins for some time and I am very satisfied with their quality. The Potassium is working out fine for me. No digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really very good at assessing how supplements make me feel, improve my health, etc., but these seem to be keeping my potassium level in the right place, so I'm happy with the purchase. Wish they were smoother/easier to swallow, but all potassium tablets seem to be cut from the same rough, dry "cloth" so that is not a complaint against this particular manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: NOW Vitamins are Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I believe in taking supplementary vitamins. But, honestly, it is hard to tell whether a particular vitamin brand is good quality or junk. Generally, taking vitamins doesn't result in an immediately noticeable effect. And there are plenty of junk vitamins on the market. SO WHY DO I LIKE NOW Brand VITAMINS? My chiropractor recommended NOW vitamins. Then I did my research. NOW gets high reviews (overall). So, I tried NOW vitamins...and I like them. I use several different kinds of NOW vitamins, including their Potassium pills. I PREFER NOW VITAMINS because it is a brand I've come to trust.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I feel anything different using this product (I do with other vitamins). After years of using all kinds of brands, Now is for sure among the few brands that I really trust. The pill itself goes down easy and no adverse side effects for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Laya Saul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have been using it for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and am qute satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Ruddell

customer_reviews.title: Severly underdose
customer_reviews.text: With only 99 mg (typical) you're going to need to take an awful lot of these pills a day to get anywhere near the daily allowance of 3,500-4,700 mg. Too bad I didn't notice that until after I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Krane

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, Potassium Gluconate 99mg, Easier to Swallow, Essential Mineral*, 250 Tablets
product_meta.description: Potassium is an essential mineral that is widely distributed among food sources, with especially high levels present in fruits and vegetables. Potassium is critical for the maintenance of normal whole-body and cellular fluid levels, as well as for the maintenance of acid-base balance.* It is also necessary for proper muscle contraction, the maintenance of healthy heart function, and for the transmission of nerve impulses.*
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL MINERAL*/EASIER TO SWALLOW TABLET: Potassium is an essential mineral that is widely distributed among food sources, with especially high levels present in fruits and vegetables

SUPPORTS ELECTROLYTE BALANCE AND NORMAL PH*/PROPER MUSCULAR CONTRACTION*: Potassium is critical for the maintenance of normal whole-body and cellular fluid levels, as well as for the maintenance of acid-base balance.*
CERTIFICATIONS/CLASSIFICATIONS: Halal, Non-GMO, Kosher, Dairy Free, Egg Free, Made without Gluten, Nut Free, Soy Free, Vegan/Vegetarian

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation)
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968
